attributes.action: Kids of all ages riding bicycle on the road without should be banned
attributes.background: These days, there are kids of all ages rides bicycle in the middle of road without any reason and no supervision. These kids should be banned from riding bicycle on road as it is not safe.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Based on your title, we're not sure without what children should be banned from cycling on the road. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
